name: River Landscape with House on a Rocky Island
description: River Landscape with House on a Rocky Island; Isaac Major (Flemish / German, 1588 - after 1642); about 1620 - 1630; Watercolor, squared in black chalk; 23.5 x 35.9 cm (9 1/4 x 14 1/8 in.); 88.GA.25; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: River Landscape with House on a Rocky Island
